mapper.select: SELECT o.* , IFNULL(l.name,'') username FROM t_office o LEFT JOIN t_floor_to_office fto ON o.id = fto.office_id LEFT JOIN t_floor f ON f.id = fto.floor_id LEFT JOIN t_lessee l ON l.id=o.user_id WHERE f.id=#{id} and o.floor=#{fid}

SELECT IFNULL( o.floor, '' ) floor , SUM(o.area) AS area FROM t_office o LEFT JOIN t_floor_to_office fo ON fo.office_id=o.id LEFT JOIN t_floor f ON f.id=fo.floor_id WHERE ( o.office_building = #{pid} OR o.shared_office_id = #{pid} ) AND f.id=#{id} GROUP BY o.floor
